snippet.title: SpellForce 3 - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
May the SpellForce be with you! RTS/RPG Hybrid SpellForce 3 is OUT NOW and will #MakeRTSGreatAgain:

- Steam: http://n.thq.com/mHki30etPid 
- gog.com: http://n.thq.com/87ig30gUGW6 
- Amazon US: http://n.thq.com/cE3L30etPvG 
- Amazon UK: http://n.thq.com/f47e30etPAO 
- Or choose your store: http://spellforce.com/order-here

By combining real-time-strategy and role-playing, SpellForce 3 takes the best from both and blends it together in a unique way. Players will create their own hero, and meet others along their epic journey through the 30+ hours of campaign gameplay. They will construct large bases and muster powerful armies, command three different factions, clash together in multiplayer matches or join forces in the co-operative campaign.

The story of SpellForce 3 takes place before the events of its predecessors, telling the tale of the aftermath of the Mage Wars – an exciting experience for players of the former SpellForce games and players who are new to the franchise alike.

Website: www.spellforce.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/spellforce
